trans-unit.source: Microsoft Azure Storage Client Library for .NET
trans-unit.target: Microsoft Azure Storage Client Library for .NET

trans-unit.source: Microsoft Azure Storage Client Library for .NET
trans-unit.target: Microsoft Azure Storage Client Library for .NET

trans-unit.source: The <externalLink><linkText>Microsoft Azure Storage Client Library reference for .NET</linkText><linkUri>http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=398944%%amp;amp;clcid=0x409</linkUri></externalLink> documents the most current version of the Storage Client Library for .NET.
trans-unit.target: The <externalLink><linkText>Microsoft Azure Storage Client Library reference for .NET</linkText><linkUri>http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=398944%%amp;amp;clcid=0x409</linkUri></externalLink> documents the most current version of the Storage Client Library for .NET.

trans-unit.source: You can install the Storage Client Library for .NET in either of two ways:
trans-unit.target: You can install the Storage Client Library for .NET in either of two ways:

trans-unit.source: Download and install the <externalLink><linkText>NuGet package</linkText><linkUri>http://www.nuget.org/packages/WindowsAzure.Storage/</linkUri></externalLink> for the latest version of the Storage Client Library.
trans-unit.target: Download and install the <externalLink><linkText>NuGet package</linkText><linkUri>http://www.nuget.org/packages/WindowsAzure.Storage/</linkUri></externalLink> for the latest version of the Storage Client Library.

trans-unit.source: This approach is recommended for ensuring that you have the most up-to-date client libraries.
trans-unit.target: This approach is recommended for ensuring that you have the most up-to-date client libraries.

trans-unit.source: Download and install the <externalLink><linkText>Azure SDK for .NET</linkText><linkUri>http://azure.microsoft.com/downloads/</linkUri></externalLink>.
trans-unit.target: Download and install the <externalLink><linkText>Azure SDK for .NET</linkText><linkUri>http://azure.microsoft.com/downloads/</linkUri></externalLink>.

trans-unit.source: The <externalLink><linkText>source code</linkText><linkUri>https://github.com/Azure/azure-storage-net</linkUri></externalLink> for the Storage Client Library for .NET is publicly available in GitHub.
trans-unit.target: The <externalLink><linkText>source code</linkText><linkUri>https://github.com/Azure/azure-storage-net</linkUri></externalLink> for the Storage Client Library for .NET is publicly available in GitHub.

trans-unit.source: The Storage Client Library 1.7 for .NET has been deprecated.
trans-unit.target: The Storage Client Library 1.7 for .NET has been deprecated.

trans-unit.source: It's recommended that you update your code to use the most recent version of the Storage Client Library.
trans-unit.target: It's recommended that you update your code to use the most recent version of the Storage Client Library.

trans-unit.source: For information on client libraries for Azure Storage for languages other than .NET, see <externalLink><linkText>Azure Storage documentation</linkText><linkUri>http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=400877%%amp;amp;clcid=0x409</linkUri></externalLink>.
trans-unit.target: For information on client libraries for Azure Storage for languages other than .NET, see <externalLink><linkText>Azure Storage documentation</linkText><linkUri>http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=400877%%amp;amp;clcid=0x409</linkUri></externalLink>.
